code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const recurrenceOptions=['None','Daily','Weekly','Monthly'];const EventForm=_ref=>{let{date,event,onSave,onCancel,onDelete}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState((event===null||event===void 0?void 0:event.title)||'');const[time,setTime]=useState((event===null||event===void 0?void 0:event.time)||'12:00');const[desc,setDesc]=useState((event===null||event===void 0?void 0:event.desc)||'');const[recurrence,setRecurrence]=useState((event===null||event===void 0?void 0:event.recurrence)||'None');const[color,setColor]=useState((event===null||event===void 0?void 0:event.color)||'');const handleSubmit=()=>{const newEvent={id:(event===null||event===void 0?void 0:event.id)||Date.now(),title,desc,time,date:date||event.date,recurrence,color};onSave(newEvent);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",value:time,onChange:e=>setTime(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Description",value:desc,onChange:e=>setDesc(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:recurrence,onChange:e=>setRecurrence(e.target.value),children:recurrenceOptions.map(opt=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:opt},opt))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"color",value:color,onChange:e=>setColor(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Save"}),onDelete&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(event.id),children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onCancel,children:"Cancel"})]})]});};export default EventForm;
